About Us

Get info

Read More About Us

Among the reasons that prompted us to start Echt Deutsch, is the difficulty that most sudaneses students find to study outside, in searching for education opportunities, so we decided to publish our experience in this field, given that we are students and employees in several different majors in Germany.

Our courses are designed to get you to the right level and achieve your desired goals.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We offer many opportunities to practice speaking in real-life contexts, which will help you gain a deeper understanding of the language and use it in everyday life.

Become part of Echt Deutsch because our courses give you the choice and flexibility to embark on an exciting learning journey each week. All our teachers are sudanese and highly qualified, creative and experienced.

Study in Germany

Understudies signed up for our course are our primary goal as is supporting them in their excursion of coming to Germany.

Learn German

We built this course for you because one of us has been where you are at right now and the other one can you give you a window to the German language, culture and pronunciations.

Simply, if you are going to be living in Germany learning German will open up so many doors for you: doors for you: in the job market,

talking to people and just getting access to a lot more information that you are only able to process if you know German.

talking to people and just getting access to a lot more information that you are only able to process if you know German.
